hero.title: Timeless Cycling
hero.subtitle: Discover high-quality bicycles and accessories, carefully selected to meet your cycling needs. Each product combines excellent craftsmanship with modern functionality.

products.title: Our Products
products.subtitle: Each product in our collection has been carefully selected to offer you the best quality bicycles and accessories for your cycling adventures.

1.name: Classic E-City
1.description: Vintage-inspired electric city bike with elegant copper accents

2.name: Retro E-Step

5.name: E-Explorer
5.description: Retro adventure e-bike with vintage leather accessories

features.title: Why Choose Us
features.subtitle: Our passion for cycling is reflected in every service we provide. We offer professional expertise and quality products for all your cycling needs.

1.title: Expert Service
1.description: Professional maintenance and repair services for all types of bicycles with certified technicians

2.title: Quality Products
2.description: High-quality bicycles and accessories from trusted brands worldwide

3.title: Personal Consultation
3.description: One-on-one consultation to find the perfect cycling solution for your needs

contact.title: Let's Connect
contact.subtitle: Ready to discover your perfect cycling companion? Get in touch and let us help you find exactly what you're looking for.
